mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM(SELECT * FROM trip_record WHERE trip_save = 'T2' AND trip_disclose = '01' ORDER BY regist_day DESC) a) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start } AND #{end }
SELECT writer_id, trip_title, start_day, end_day FROM trip_record WHERE post_id = #{postId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'trr' || (TO_NUMBER(NVL((SUBSTR(MAX(post_id), 4)), (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || '0000'))) + 1) FROM trip_record WHERE SUBSTR(post_id, 4, 6) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD')
INSERT INTO trip_record ( post_id , writer_id , trip_title , start_day , end_day , trip_disclose , trip_save , regist_day , trip_share ) VALUES ( #{postId} , #{writerId} , #{tripTitle} , #{startDay} , #{endDay} , #{tripDisclose} , 'T2' , sysdate , #{tripShare} )
